event.title: Clojure eXchange 2018 raffle
event.description:
Skills Matter have kindly given the Bristol meetup group a ticket to this year's Clojure eXchange:
https://skillsmatter.com/conferences/10459-clojure-exchange-2018

It's happening in London on Monday 3rd till Tuesday 4th December 2018.
If you can make those dates and would like a chance to win the ticket, please sign up to this meeting and we will pick a winner from the list.

We will make the draw at the next meeting:
https://www.meetup.com/Bristol-Clojurians/events/nwvqlqyxpbcc/

Good Luck!

Richard
PS. There's a 20% discount promo code if you wish to purchase a ticket: CLOJUREX-18-20
